summary: Adds \"Get some rest, you look weary...\" option to current followers dialogue that resets followers stats using disable/enable method.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][b]This mod is obsolete as of Skyrim official patch 1.6 (but still can be used to fix followers in save games made prior this patch).[/b][/color]

Description:
Adds \"Get some rest, you look weary...\" option to current followers dialogue that resets followers stats using disable/enable method. (Retaining all items in followers inventory.)

Version History:
1.0 - Initial release.
1.1 - Ironed out some re equipping quirks.
1.2 - Overhauled internal script mechanics and tweaked fade effect times.

Known Issues:
Has a small issue with \"Auto Unequip Arrows\" mod by Alek (Does not re equip arrows, can be fixed by forcing the follower to switch weapons).

Special Thanks:
To Shadowmann for some good pointers (used in 1.1).

p.s. Inspired by feature from \"UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul\" mod by fLokii (I liked the idea but wanted to keep my game more vanilla, did not need the other stuff in that mod + this feature needed some tweaks IMHO.)

p.p.s. Should also work with other follower mods and custom followers.
